name: com.unity.services.authentication
description:
A client-side SDK for managing the signing-in of a player to the Unity User Authentication Service (UAS) and the provision of associated identifiers and tokens for use by other packages and services. 

Initial features include: 
▪ Anonymous login 
▪ Automatic access token refresh during session 

Note: this is still in development.

samples.description: Example scripts and UI elements demonstrating the Authentication package.
Basic example scripts demonstrating how to interact with Authentication package API's.
